name: swipe
content:
swipe verb
(HIT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T, usually + adv/prep ] to hit or try to hit something, especially with a sideways movement: She opened the window and swiped at the flies with a rolled-up newspaper to make them go out.UK She swiped him round the head.mainly US The car swiped the side of the garage as he pulled out. (MOVE)
[ T ] to move a card containing information stored on a magnetic strip through a device that reads this information
